CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES AND RESOLUTIONS
modified
This is a chronological listing of the ordinances and resolutions of Lumpkin County, Georgia, used in this Code. Repealed or superseded laws at the time of the codification and any omitted materials are not reflected in the table.
EXPAND
Resolution
Number Date Section Section
this Code
